name: pumpkynHead
overview:
pumpkynHead is an Australian software product development company that is currently working on a nascent media revolution concept.

pumpkynHead has a few advisers in areas such as business, sales and technology. The advisers collectively have more than three decades of industry experience specific to start ups and software product/platform development via outsourcing.

We have now completed the alpha build of its flagship platform Pondoly. Pondoly re-writes reading and authoring experience! While authors can think of it as platform that enables them to bring their books out fast-to-market, readers can look forward to having a collection of books whose content changes to keep the reader going back to the same book over and over!

Should you wish to learn more register your interest on pondoly.com or drop in an email to: enquiry@pumpkynhead.com.

A select few will be the first to experience the awesomeness as soon as we launch!

products.name: Pondoly - A platform to revolutionize reading and authoring

milestones.description: Alpha build of pumpkynHead's flagship platform is almost ready for select members of the public, media personnel and people that crave repetitive awesomeness in eBook reading experience!
milestones.source_description: Pondoly - Awesomeness is close at hand!
